tool_description: Develops SMART goals and objectives hierarchy based on identified community needs and organizational mission alignment.

identified_needs.description: Prioritized list of community needs to address

organizational_mission.description: Organization's mission statement or core purpose

available_resources.description: General description of organizational capacity and resources

time_horizon.description: Program timeframe: short-term (1 year), medium-term (2-3 years), long-term (4+ years)

error_messages: Empty needs list: Provide at least one identified community need.
Invalid time horizon: Use one of [short-term, medium-term, long-term].
Missing mission alignment: Organizational mission statement cannot be empty.
Too many needs: Focus on 10 or fewer priority needs for effective goal development.
Insufficient resource description: Provide meaningful description of available resources.
usage: Input identified needs, organizational mission, available resources, and time horizon. Optionally include success measures and stakeholder priorities. Tool creates structured SMART goals aligned with needs and capacity.

program_goal.description: Primary overarching goal for the program

smart_objectives.description: Specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, time-bound objectives

success_indicators.description: Measurable indicators for tracking goal achievement

goal_alignment_analysis.description: Analysis of how goals align with needs and organizational mission
